title: Hungarians in Michigan (Discovering the Peoples of Michigan)
features: This work examines six distinct migrant streams that contributed to the formation of Michigan's Hungarian communities. It draws a dynamic picture of cultural retention and change among diverse Hungarian migrants.
description: Eva V. Huseby-Darvas is an anthropologist and teaches at the University of Michigan, Dearborn.
